overview_of_class: Discrete mathematics, inductive reasoning, counting problems, binomial coefficients and Pascal's triangle, Fibonacci numbers, combinatorial probability, divisibility and primes, partitions, and generating functions. Prerequisite: 240 or instructor's consent.
name: Combinatorics & Discrete Mathematics
title: WCAS MATH 306-0-41 Combinatorics & Discrete Mathematics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Discrete mathematics, inductive reasoning, counting problems, binomial coefficients and Pascal's triangle, Fibonacci numbers, combinatorial probability, divisibility and primes, partitions, and generating functions. Prerequisite: 240 or instructor's consent.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Discrete mathematics, inductive reasoning, counting problems, binomial coefficients and Pascal's triangle, Fibonacci numbers, combinatorial probability, divisibility and primes, partitions, and generating functions.
